Time : 7:00 pm Add to Calendar 06/08/2015 19:00 06/08/2015 21:10 Asia/Kolkata Habitat Film Club presents "Mohan Joshi Hazir Ho!" film screening Event Page : http://www.delhievents.com/2015/08/habitat-film-club-presents-life-word.html Habitat World, India Habitat Centre (IHC), Lodhi Road, New Delhi-110003

Duration : 130 mins

Entry : Free (Seating on First-Come First-Served basis)

Venue : Habitat World,India Habitat Centre (IHC), Lodhi Road, New Delhi-110003

Parking : Gate No. 1, 2 & 3 (Cars), Gate No. 2 (Bikes & Bicycles)

Venue Info : Events | About | Map | Nearest Metro Stations :

'Jor Bagh(Yellow Line)Exit Gate-1' - Walk Direction

'Khan Market(Violet Line)'

Area : Lodhi Road Area Events

Event Description : Habitat Film Club presents Bhisham Sahni As Actor "Mohan Joshi Hazir Ho!" film screening as part of "Life-Word-Image: A Hundred Years Of Bhisham Sahni".

An art film based on the director’s own story, during the Parallel Cinema period of Indian cinema. The film is a comic satire on the judicial system, where cases drag on for decades, plaintiffs either die or lose hope and money, and the corrupt run scot free, thanks to their nexus with corrupt lawyers. Winner of the National Film Award for Best Film on Family Welfare, 1984.

Language : Hindi

Year : 1984

Director : Saeed Akhtar Mirza

Cast: Bhisham Sahni, Naseeruddin Shah, Deepti Naval, Dina Pathak

Related Links : Movies | ComedyShows
